summary: Newark is the biggest city in New Jersey and an important part of the New York area. With a population of over 300,000, it's one of the oldest cities in the U.S., founded in 1666. Newark's location by the Passaic River and Newark Bay makes it a key port and shipping center. It's also home to a major airport and many big companies. The city has several universities, museums, and performance venues. Newark is divided into five wards, with different ethnic groups living in each. Ras Baraka has been the mayor since 2014.
title: Newark, New Jersey
